Body:
Description: Hello Team,

Weâ€™ve observed that on macOS, enabling "Cloudflare Services" causes EPP policies to stop functioning. Both Cloudflare Services and our EPP install certificates in the browser, which seems to create a conflict.

Could you please suggest a workaround to ensure both services can operate simultaneously?

Best regards,
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed
Invitation updated. Attendees: Alin Anca, Bhavishya Arya

What We've Learned Updated: We could identify that the CAP policies are working as expected when the Cloudflare solution is disabled, but when it is enabled, the policies are not working.
We tested this both on MacOS and also on UbuntuOS, just with these is the issue is present.
The CAP policies that we tested were configured simple with:
- block & report
- exit points selected for the browsers
- some file types selected in the denylist (we had excel, powerpoint, pdf)
- the computer selected in the policy

We have collected logs and also extended DPI logs.
I will also attach some screenshots with the DPI configuration and the Cloudflare solution that they are using.

What We've Learned Updated: We could identify that the CAP policies are working as expected when the Cloudflare solution is disabled, but when it is enabled, the policies are not working.
We tested this both on MacOS and also on UbuntuOS, just with these is the issue present.
The CAP policies that we tested were configured simple with:
- block & report
- exit points selected for the browsers
- some file types selected in the denylist (we had excel, powerpoint, pdf)
- the computer selected in the policy

We have collected logs from each separate OS and also extended DPI logs.
I will also attach some screenshots with the DPI configuration and the Cloudflare solution that they are using.
Next Steps Updated: Investigation regarding the networking configuration that the customer has and how this affects our ability to scan the uploaded items

Steps to Reproduce Updated: The CAP policies that we tested were configured simple with:
- block & report
- exit points selected for the browsers
- some file types selected in the denylist (we had excel, powerpoint, pdf)
- the computer selected in the policy

Cloudflare solution is enabled.
